title: The Treasure Hunters
description: WARNING: MAY CONTAIN TRACES OF SCIENCE FICTION.A lost treasure more valuable than any ever found...Spanish conquistadors had heard tales of it when exploring the New World. Native South American tribes told of it in their legends; cautioning about the ancient perils which anyone finding it would unleash.During World War 2, Nazi-inspired archaeologists were convinced that they had pinpointed its location. And yet the treasure had never been discovered - not by anyone who had lived to tell the tale.It was as if someone, or something, was protecting it...
author: Warren Dean
